  4. A popup will appear that will allow you to set a PIN number. Enter the PIN and click Save.

  5. Another popup will appear saying "PIN Number updated successfully".

data.title: ¿Cómo cambiar una contraseña?
data.description: ¡Este artículo cubrirá todo lo que necesita saber para poder restablecer la contraseña de alguien de forma rápida y sencilla!
data.body:
¡Es fácil restablecer la contraseña de alguien y este artículo explicará exactamente cómo hacerlo!

Requisitos

NOTA: Debe tener acceso al módulo de empleados en la parte izquierda de su pantalla en el menú principal.

Aquí están los pasos para cambiar una contraseña:

  1. Haga clic en esta foto para ver el video de "Cómo cambiar una contraseña":

    FieldFlo Tutorial - How to reset a password.mp4

  2. Haga clic en el módulo de empleados (situado en el lado izquierdo de su pantalla en el menú principal).

  3. Ahora que está en la página del módulo de empleados, haga clic en el campo de búsqueda rápida de empleados. Escriba en el nombre del empleado que necesita cambiar la contraseña y presione Enter en su teclado.

  4. En el lado derecho del empleado que usted necesita cambiar la contraseña. Haga clic en tres puntos y luego haga clic en cambiar contraseña.

  5. Un popup te va a pedir que digas "Por favor confirme?" Haga clic en Sí para confirmar.

  6. Después de hacer clic en sí aparecerá otra ventana con una notificación de que dice "Cambriar de la contraseña con éxito". Haga clic en OK

data.title: How Do I Use GEO Fencing or GEO Tagging
data.description: This article will cover everything you need to know about using GEO Fencing and GEO Tagging.
data.body:
Geo Fencing and Geo Tagging are incredible features that will allow your company to have more control over your projects. This article will explain exactly what each feature is and how you can use each of them in you business!

Requirements

NOTE: GEO Fencing and GEO Tagging are defaulted to OFF throughout your portal. If you would like to use either or both of these, you need to turn them on in the Project Details under settings.

NOTE: FieldFlo does not have a way to force an employee to share their location. This is dependent on your company's policy and whether or not you require them to share their location.

Information

If you are not sure what GEO Fencing and GEO Tagging are, no worries, we are here to help explain!

GEO Fencing is and invisible fence that is placed around your project in a half mile radius, and is based on your Project's address or your Projects Longitude and Latitude. If this is turned on "Yes", the Supervisor will not be able start a Daily Timesheet until the Supervisor is within the half mile radius.

GEO Tagging is a location recorder of the employees. In other words, when GEO Tagging is turned on, FieldFlo will send a text message to employees asking them to "Check-in" or "Check-out" when a Supervisor Starts or Ends time on the Daily Timesheet.

Here are the steps to turn on GEO Fencing or GEO Tagging:

Click this Video to watch the "How To Turn On GEO Fencing and GEO Tagging" video.

  1. Click on the Projects module (located on the left hand side of your screen in the main menu).

  2. Now that you are on the Projects module page, click inside Project Quick Search field.

  3. You can change how you search for a Project by clicking on the drop-down in the Project Quick Search field to either search by "Name" or "Number".

    Two options:

    Click Name and type in the first couple of characters to search by Project Name and hit Enter on your keyboard.

    Click Number and type in the first couple of numbers to search by Project Number and hit Enter on your keyboard.

  4. Click on the Project.

  5. On the right hand side you will see blue text that says "Project Details". Click the Project Details hyperlink.

  6. Click on Settings.

  7. Find the GEO Fencing and GEO Tagging drop-downs and change them to "Yes" to turn on features.

  8. Now that these say "Yes" scroll down and click Save.

Here are the steps to see where an employee checked in using the GEO Tagging location:

NOTE: GEO Tagging must be turned on and a timesheet must exist that an employee has checked in on.

NOTE: You can also check on past check-ins an and check-outs under the Closed Forms section of a Project if Geo Tagging was turned on.

Click this Video to watch the "How To See Where An Employee Checked In" video.

  1. Click on the Projects module (located on the left hand side of your screen in the main menu).

  2. Now that you are on the Projects module page, click inside Project Quick Search field.

  3. You can change how you search for a Project by clicking on the drop-down in the Project Quick Search field to either search by "Name" or "Number".

    Two options:

    Click Name and type in the first couple of characters to search by Project Name and hit Enter on your keyboard.

    Click Number and type in the first couple of numbers to search by Project Number and hit Enter on your keyboard.

  4. Click on the Project.

  5. Scroll down and click on the Daily Time Sheet.

  6. Find the Employee and click on the Employee to show the details.

  7. Next to Geo Tagging, click IN or OUT to see where an employe checked in or checked out and a pop-up will appear showing the location.

data.title: How Do I Reset A Password
data.description: This article will cover everything you need to know so you can reset someone's password quickly and easily!
data.body:
It's easy to reset someone's password and this article will explain exactly how you can do it!

Requirements

NOTE: In order to change Employee passwords, you must be an Admin or Guru at your company, and have access to the Employee module on the left hand side of your screen in the main menu.

Information

You might be wondering, "What is an employee password used for?" An employee password is used only by the employees that need to be able to log into your company's FieldFlo Portal.

Here are the steps to resetting a password:

Click this Video to watch the "How Do I Reset A Password" video:

  1. Click on the Employees module (located on the left hand side of your screen in the main menu).

  2. Now that you are on the Employees module page, click inside the Employee Quick Search field. Type in the name of the employee you are needing to change the password for and hit Enter on your keyboard.

  3. On the right hand side of the employee that you are needing to change the password for, are three little dots. Click three little dots and then click Reset Password.

  4. A popup will appear asking you to "Please Confirm?" Click Yes to confirm.

  5. After you click yes another popup will appear with a notification that the says "Password Reset Successfully". Click OK

data.title: 🚀 Getting started with Articles
data.description: Some resources to help you understand how Articles can be used
data.body:
This example article is a draft. Drafts are only visible to you and your team.

You can add drafts to your Help Center, but they won't be visible to your customers until you publish them.

🎯 Want to further control who can see your articles?

You can add targeting to your articles, making them visible only to those who match certain criteria. This makes it easy to keep certain articles private or hidden. For more information, check out this article.


​

🏁 Ready to get started?

Check out these resources:

  • Guide for creating your first article

  • Guide for what articles to write

  • Best practice webinar
